title: Asia stocks bounce on firmer Chinese lead, pound steadies
text: Asian stocks bounced on Wednesday, led by Chinese markets after a report showed growth in the country's service sector accelerating despite broader economic headwinds, while the pound halted its decline on hopes a no-deal Brexit may yet be averted.

title: ECB back to easing again, but inflation still not in its grip: Reuters poll
